description:
Fire happily reminisces about winning the battle.  When suddenly, Pandora appears again and another battle begins!  This time the opponents who stand before Fire are the Black Knight Gebulg and the Black Flame Warrior Bahn!  Tanta just can’t match the Black Flame Warrior’s strength.  Tanta who strongly seeks power gets his hands on the enemy’s “Halberd of Darkness”...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Warrior of Black Flames Bahn
